title: The Departure
content:
I left long ago

**I didn't go with the flow**

*The voice came from within*

> And when I crossed
> I burned the bridges behind me

title: Echoes of Silence
content:
In the quiet, I find my song

A murmur deep, where I belong

No crowd, no cheer, no fleeting praise

Just endless **echoes** in endless ways

title: Horizons
content:
The sky bends low, the earth stands wide

*Dreams unfold where shadows hide*

Each step I take, the distance grows

Towards **horizons** no one knows
